short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add personal notes to LinkedIn profiles

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A floating panel to take notes for a LinkedIn profile that only you can see. Whenever you need to add some additional information about a LinkedIn profile just for you, this browser extension is perfect for that minimalist functionality.
